PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_GeoObsFoldAxis
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for geological fold axis observations.

PropertyDef.Name: FoldType
PropertyDef.Definition: Types of Geological Folds, which can be classified according to various factors independently.

PropertyDef.Name: DeformationPhase
PropertyDef.Definition: Name or label for a geologic event such as a basin formation, compressional tectonic phase, orogeny etc.

PropertyDef.Name: AzimuthHingeLine
PropertyDef.Definition: The azimuth of the hinge line of the fold. The azimuth is given in degrees in the range 0 to 360 degrees counted clockwise from true north and expressed as a three-digit number, e.g. 240 or 015.

PropertyDef.Name: AzimuthHingeLineation
PropertyDef.Definition: The azimuth of the lineation. The azimuth is given in degrees in the range 0 to 360 degrees counted clockwise from true north and expressed as a three-digit number, e.g. 240 or 015.

PropertyDef.Name: Plunge
PropertyDef.Definition: The angle of inclination of the fold axis with the horizontal as measured in a vertical plane.
